word: Mind the Source of All Actions, Good or Bad.--He has prepared this living habitation for the mind; it is "curiously wrought," a temple which the Lord Himself has fitted up for the indwelling of His Holy Spirit. The mind controls the whole man. All our actions, good or bad, have their source in the mind. It is the mind that worships God and allies us to heavenly beings. Yet many spend all their lives without becoming intelligent in regard to the . . . [jewel case] that contains this treasure.--SpTEd 33, May 11, 1896. (FE 426.)
